name: @streamlined-cms/client-sdk

scripts.demo: npm run build && ln -sfn ../dist demo/dist && concurrently -n rollup,vite -c blue,green "npm run dev" "vite --config vite.demo.config.ts --host --mode development"
scripts.demo:https: npm run build && ln -sfn ../dist demo/dist && concurrently -n rollup,vite -c blue,green "npm run dev" "HTTPS=true vite --config vite.demo.config.ts --host --mode development"
scripts.demo:staging: npm run build && ln -sfn ../dist demo/dist && concurrently -n rollup,vite -c blue,green "npm run dev" "vite --config vite.demo.config.ts --host --mode staging"
scripts.demo:staging:https: npm run build && ln -sfn ../dist demo/dist && concurrently -n rollup,vite -c blue,green "npm run dev" "HTTPS=true vite --config vite.demo.config.ts --host --mode staging"
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx serve demo
scripts.cdn:upload:PRODUCTION: echo '⚠️  UPLOADING TO PRODUCTION CDN' && read -p 'Type YES to continue: ' c && [ "$c" = 'YES' ] && node scripts/cdn-upload.js production
scripts.cdn:publish:PRODUCTION: echo '⚠️  PUBLISHING TO PRODUCTION CDN' && read -p 'Type YES to continue: ' c && [ "$c" = 'YES' ] && node scripts/cdn-publish.js production
scripts.cdn:purge:PRODUCTION: echo '⚠️  PURGING PRODUCTION CDN CACHE' && read -p 'Type YES to continue: ' c && [ "$c" = 'YES' ] && node scripts/cdn-purge.js production
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:browser

author: Matthew Brisebois
description: Streamlined CMS Client SDK - Lightweight library for inline website editing
